document.discussion_title: The 10 Funniest Reactions to the Game of Thrones Season 6 Premiere
document.topic_text: The 10 Funniest Reactions to the Game of Thrones Season 6 Premiere Comment Posted Apr. 25, 2016 at 11:53 AM Updated at 2:47 PM Posted Apr 25, 2016 at 11:53 AM Updated at 2:47 PM (WARNING: This post contains spoilers for Sunday's episode of Game of Thrones .) If there was one hugely memeable moment in the Game of Thrones Season 6 premiere, it was when Melisandre (Carice van Houten) took off her magical necklace and revealed she's hundreds of years old . Fans reacted to other things, sure; but that witchy, decrepit image loomed over all the others, inspiring thousands and thousands of reactions... Mostly in the realm of "WH T?" But some folks got a little more creative (and reacted to some other stuff), so gaze upon the 10 funniest memes from "The Red Woman" below: 1. Daenerys is all of us. A photo posted by Bustle (@bustle) on Apr 25, 2016 at 5:29am PDT 2. Did Ned Stark tell dad jokes like this? A photo posted by N. (@she.loves.chai) on Apr 25, 2016 at 6:05am PDT 3. The circle of Jon Snow's life will be more circular than other people's. Me while watching #GameofThrones I'm still not giving up hope¨ pic.twitter.com/wEwOEnzpSM — Megan (@meganperryy) April 25, 2016 4. Keep it on, keep it on! When she take the necklace off vs. when she put it back on. #GameofThrones pic.twitter.com/4Of98OhSqC — Kyle Gonzales (@kylegonzales505) April 25, 2016 5. Remember the movie Orphan ? It had a similar twist. Girls who wear necklace are the girls you should avoid. #GameofThrones pic.twitter.com/8rTuDOVBeT — Gerald Santos (@OhGerald) April 25, 2016 6. Melisandre's contour game is on point. when you come home from the bar and take off your makeup pic.twitter.com/57KzJ03ayR — dodai (@dodaistewart) April 25, 2016 7. It puts the lotion on its skin, amirite? A photo posted by Moviepilot (@moviepilot) on Apr 25, 2016 at 6:02am PDT 8. "WTF" - everyone Last 2 minutes of #GameofThrones had me like pic.twitter.com/u5odRVUbcy — duwe (@mountain_Duwe) April 25, 2016 9. Hey, look, Amy Schumer is a fan! Do you guys like how I look? pic.twitter.com/21jO0lMedT — Amy Schumer (@amyschumer) April 25, 2016 10. Melisandre even has her own "Precious." Gollum and Melisandre would make a great couple #GameofThrones pic.twitter.com/yGmOl3QpdJ — Mhysa. (@MATSUOSWALD) April 25, 2016 Other Links From TVGuide.com
